metaData.label: targeted
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology OR SPECIALTY_2 equal Venereology

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="TargetedHCPs_list_export.SPECIALTY_1" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"9ff0ad40-657d-ea11-a2e5-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="f12dd90f-36dc-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[Dermatology]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition><Condition Key="TargetedHCPs_list_export.SPECIALTY_2" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"9ff0ad40-657d-ea11-a2e5-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="f12dd90f-36dc-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[Venereology]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
